title: WBIT #8: Typescript for gut biomes
description: Kyle is joined by his former colleague Tyler McEntee, now a senior software engineer at Jona, to talk about doing everything all at once at a startup.
author: Ryan Donovan
excerpt: Kyle is joined by his former colleague Tyler McEntee, now a senior software engineer at Jona, to talk about doing everything all at once at a startup.
text: May 26, 2025Kyle is joined by his former colleague Tyler McEntee, now a senior software engineer at Jona, to talk about doing everything all at once at a startup. Kyle is joined by his former colleague Tyler McEntee, now a senior software engineer at Jona. They talk about the many hats he wears on the job and off (he once sent homemade hot sauce to testers at Stack Overflow), the guts of the gut biome evaluation system he works on, and the pleasures of a statically-typed language.Episode notes:Jona provides an AI-powered gut biome test for clinicians and patients alike.Connect with Tyler on Twitter.TRANSCRIPT
html:
May 26, 2025

Kyle is joined by his former colleague Tyler McEntee, now a senior software engineer at Jona, to talk about doing everything all at once at a startup.

Kyle is joined by his former colleague Tyler McEntee, now a senior software engineer at Jona. They talk about the many hats he wears on the job and off (he once sent homemade hot sauce to testers at Stack Overflow), the guts of the gut biome evaluation system he works on, and the pleasures of a statically-typed language.

Episode notes:

Jona provides an AI-powered gut biome test for clinicians and patients alike.

Connect with Tyler on Twitter.

TRANSCRIPT
